::: {.question-block}
<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault(); checkAnswer('module2_mcq_q43')" data-correct-answer="C">
<strong style="display: block;">
An asset has the following possible returns and probabilities:  
- With probability 25%: return = −20%.  
- With probability 50%: return = +10%.  
- With probability 25%: return = +40%.  

What is the expected return of this asset?
</strong>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q43" value="A"> A. 8%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q43" value="B"> B. 9%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q43" value="C"> C. 10%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q43" value="D"> D. 11%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q43" value="E"> E. 12%</label><br>
</form>
<div id="feedback-module2_mcq_q43" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
✅ Correct: C.  
E[R] = 0.25×(−0.20) + 0.50×0.10 + 0.25×0.40 = −0.05 + 0.05 + 0.10 = 0.10 = 10%.  
This calculation uses the **historical average return** as the best estimate of expected return.
</div>
